ygData.subject: The best spell list I have found yet!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: http://gameznet.com/eq/     give this sight a try!!!!! this is where I got the spell list!! Level 1 Cavorting Bones This is the first in the line of
ygData.messageBody:
http://gameznet.com/eq/ give this sight a try!!!!! this is where I got
the spell list!!


Level 1

Cavorting Bones

This is the first in the line of necromancer pet spells. This spell summons
a level 1 decaying skeleton.

Cold Light

This spell summons a dim light which can be used as a lightsource.

Disease Cloud

This spell will disease your opponent and do a small amount of damage
initially as well.

Invisibility To Undead

This spell renders you invisible to undead mobs.

Lifetap

This is the first in a line of spells which is unique to necromancers. This
spell will suck hit points away from your opponent and give them to you.

Locate Corpse

This spell will point you in the direction of the nearest corpse.

Minor Shielding

This is the first in the line of the wizards shielding spells. This spell
adds armor class and hit points. It can be cast on yourself only.

Reclaim Energy

This spell is cast on summoned pets. When cast on a pet this allows you to
reclaim the mana you spent on him to a certain extent and "unsummon" him.

Sense The Dead

This spell will point you in the direction of the nearest undead monster.

Siphon Strength

This spell will lower your targets strength and add it to yours.

Level 4

Clinging Darkness

This is a duration of time spell which causes damage over time. It also
slows the targets speed down as it is somewhat of a blinding spell.

Endure Cold

This spell adds to the targets resistance to cold.

Fear

Fear will cause your opponent to turn and run away at full speed. Be warned
however that he will return when the spell wears off and he may bring
friends.

Gate

The gate spell will teleport you home to your bind point.

Grim Aura

This spell will add to your ATK rating similar to the firefist spell of
druids.

Leering Corpse

This spell summons a level 3-5 skeleton.

Lifespike

Lifespike is the upgrade to lifetap. This spell takes transfers some of the
hit points of your opponent and adds them to your hit points.

Numb The Dead

Numb the dead is an undead calming spell. By casting this spell on undead
beings you will cause them not to attack players they would normally attack.

Poison Bolt

This spell will poison your opponent doing damage to him over time.

Sense Magic

This spell will give you information on magic items.

Level 8

Bonewalk

This spell will summon a level 7-9 skeletal pet.



Dark Pact

This spell will take you hit points away and add to your mana.

Dark Empathy

This spell will heal your target while damaging yourself.

Deadeye

Deadeye grants the caster not only infravision but also the ability to see
invisible beings. This is important for races who do not have the benefit of
infravision.

Gather Shadows

Gather shadows is an invisibility spell that can only be cast on yourself.
This is very important to evil players as it will allow you to travel places
you previously were cut off from.

Impart Strength

This spell will give some of your strength to your target.

Lesser Shielding

This is an upgrade to the minor shielding spell. It adds armor class and hit
points.

Mend Bones

This spell allows you to heal your pet.

Shadow Step

This spell is a short mini teleportation spell that will teleport you a
short distance away from your current location. It is mainly used as an
escape spell.

Vampiric Embrace

This is an more powerful version of the lifetap spell. This spell will drain
hit points away from your target and give it to you. This has the benefit of
not only damaging your enemy but healing yourself as well.

Ward Undead

This is a direct damage spell for use versus undead beings. It is the first
in a line of spells.

Level 12

Bind Affinity

This spell allows you to change your binding point where you will return if
you gate or die.

Convoke Shadow

This spell will summon a level 11-13 pet.

Endure Disease

This spell will increase your resistance to disease.

Engulfing Darkness

This damage over time spell is an upgrade to the clinging darkness spell.

Heat Blood

This is a damage over time spell. The importance of it is that it can be
stacked with the clinging->engulfing darkness line of spells which will
allow you to do a lot more damage stacking the two of them.

Lifedraw

Lifedraw is an upgrade to the lifetap line of spells which will heal
yourself by stealing a monsters hit points.

Sight Graft

This somewhat useless spell will allow you to see through your pets eyes.

Spook The Dead

This is an undead fear spell. When can upon the undead it will cause them to
turn and run away. This can be a useful spell when used in conjunction with
numb as you can numb one of the undead to prevent him from attacking you and
spook the other one away from the area and get a chance to fight it one on
one.

Wave Of Enfeeblement

Wave of Enfeeblement is an area effect weaken spell.

Level 16

Banshee Aura

This is an upgrade to the grim aura spell. It allows you to cast a damage
shield around yourself which will punish your opponents for making contact
with you.

Cancel Magic

This spell can be used to cancel magical effects that have been cast on you
or your party members. It's great to eliminate damage over time, charm or
root spells.

Cure Disease

Cure disease will allow you to cure yourself or another player of a disease.

Feign Death

This spell allows you to play dead. If it works the monster will assume you
are dead and will leave you alone. You can lay around and regain hit points
and then get up and run.

Heart Flutter

This is a triple threat spell. It not only weakens your opponent and lowers
their armor class but it also does damage over time.

Hungry Earth

This is a root spell which works only on undead.

Infectous Cloud

This is an area effect disease spell.

Restless Bones

Restless bones will summon a skeletal pet.

Shielding

This is an upgrade to the minor shielding->lesser shielding line of spells.
It adds not only armor class and hit points but magic resistance as well.

Shieldskin

This spell allows you to absorb a certain amount of damage without being
injured.

Spirit Armor

Spirit armor is a buffing spell which can be cast on yourself and others
which will add armor class.

Voice Graft

This somewhat useless spell will allow you to speak through your pet. It is
great for toying around with(especially when you are invisible) however it
does not have much use.

Level 20

Allure Of Death

This spell transforms the caster into a skeleton. It is a -hp and +mana
spell.

Animate Dead

This spell will summon a level 20ish pet.

Dominate Undead

Dominate undead is a spell that can be used to charm undead monsters and use
them as pets.

Expulse Undead

Expulse undead is an upgrade to the ward undead spell. It not only does more
damage but is also more mana efficient.

Harm Shield

Harm shield grants the caster a brief period of invulnerability.

Identify

This spell identifies magical items. I really do not see much use for it in
this game.

Siphon Life

Siphon life is another upgrade to the lifetap line of spells which drains a
monsters hit points and gives them to the caster.

Word Of Shadow

This is an area effect damage spell that centers around the caster.

Level 24

Breath Of The Dead

This is a water breathing spell.

Charm

This spell will allow you to charm your target and use it as a pet.

Haunting Corpse

Haunting corpse is the level 24 upgrade to your pet summoning spells.

Intensify Dead

This spell allows your pet to dish out more damage and it also acts as a
regeneration spell on your pet.

Leatherskin

Leatherskin is an upgrade to the shieldskin spell. It absorbs more damage.

Major Shielding

This is an upgrade to the minor->lesser->shielding line of spells.

Resist Cold

This spell will add to your resistance to cold.

Rest The Dead

Strong Lull the Undead spell

Shadow Sight

Shadow sight grants ultravision to the caster.

Shock Of Poison

It does direct damage of 160 damage for 100 mana. This spell is a Damage
over time spell as well.

Level 29

Blood Boil

This spell is an upgrade to the heat blood spell. It can be stacked with
darkness spells for maximum damage over time.

Dismiss Undead

This is an upgrade to the ward->expulse undead line of spells. It is a high
mana high efficiency spell which is very useful versus undead foes.

Dooming Darkness

Dooming darkness is an upgrade to the clinging darkness->engulfing darkness
line of spells. It does damage over time.

Panic The Dead

Panic The Dead is an upgrade to the spook undead spell. It has a longer
duration and will work more on higher level foes.

Renew Bones

This spell is a buff for your pet that gives AC and Hitpoints. It is an
upgrade to Mend Bones.

Spirit Tap

This is an upgrade to the lifetap line of spells.

Summon Dead

Summon dead is the level 29 pet summoning spell.

Vampiric Wave

This is an area effect spell similar to vampiric embrace.

Level 34

Beguile Undead

This is an upgrade to the charm undead spell.

Call Of Bones

Not really sure about this one. Mail me if you have info.

Greater Shielding

Greater shielding is an upgrade to the lesser->minor->shielding->major
shielding line of spells.

Invoke Fear

Invoke fear is an upgrade to the fear spell. It has a longer duration.

Invoke Shadow

This is the level 34 summoning spell.

Resist Disease

This is an upgrade to the endure disease spell. It adds more resistance.

Root

Root will prevent an NPC from running.

Steelskin

Steelskin is an upgrade to the leatherskin spell. It absorbs damage.

Surge Of Enfeeblement

This is an AE weaken spell.

Venom Of The Snake

This is a poison spell which will do damage over time.

Level 39

Augment Dead

Anyone who has information on this spell please mail me.

Counteract Disease

This is an upgrade to the cure disease spell. It is more effective with high
level poisons.

Drain Spirit

This is an upgrade to the Spirit Tap spell.

Expel Undead

Expel undead is an upgrade to the ward->expulse->dismiss undead line of
spells. It does DD to undead foes.

Malignant Dead

This is the level 39 summoning spell.

Nullify Magic

Nullify magic is an upgrade to the cancel magic spell.

Scourge

This is a disease attack.

Word Of Souls

Word of souls is an area effect spell which centers around the caster.

Level 44

Arch Shielding

Arch shielding is the final upgrade to the shielding spells.

Beguile

Beguile is a more powerful version of the charm spell.

Crackling Bones

Crackling bones is the level 44 pet summoning spell.

Dead Man Walking

This spell is an upgrade to the level 20 allure of death spell. It will turn
you into skeletal form.

Diamondskin

This is the final upgrade to the shieldskin->leatherskin line of spells. It
absorbs damage that would otherwise hurt the caster.

Level 49

Banish Undead

This is the last in the line of the ward->expulse->dismiss->expel undead
line of spells.

Cajole Undead

Cajole undead is a high level undead charming spell.

Cascading Darkness

Cascading darkness is an upgrade to the clinging->engulfing darkness line of
spells. It does damage over time.

Drain Soul

Drain soul is an upgrade to the lifetap line of spells.

Expel Summoned

Expel summoned will do good damage to summoned beasts such as elements.

Invoke Death

This is the level 49 summoning spell.

Lifetap AEIV

This is an area effect lifetap spell. Since there are no level 49
necromancers in the game we can only ponder how nice it must be.

>
